Remote: 1b(UF) - Retrieve machines in network and ping and save list

Local: 5a - Set expiration date for all users in specific OU
6a - Get rid of expiration date for specific users
7a - Set email address for all users
100a(CCDC)(UF) - Enable PS Remoting on all machines across domain via GP (WinRM)
101a(CCDC) - Get inventory for all machines across domain
